note:
Note: In a declared heat emergency,
the state may provide crisis cooling assistance.

Note: Crisis funds may be used for cooling
equipment repair or replacement.
Note: If funds are available, the state may offer temporary cooling assistance in unusually high heat.
Note: Crisis funds are available year round for heating and cooling crises.
Note: Once-a-year benefit can be used for heating, cooling and expedited crisis.
Note: Combined year-round heating and cooling program.
Note: Certain types of cooling assistance may be available during long periods of high heat.
Note: Unused winter crisis funds roll over to summer crisis.
Note: The 5% for crisis represents heating funds expedited in crises.
Note: Cooling is provided in summer if funding is available.
Note: Cooling is provided if funding is available.
Note: Heating and cooling are one year-round program.
Note: Cooling is provided if funding is available.
Note: Year-round crisis includes heating and cooling.
